# Shatter Defenses (Feat)
## Overview
Your skill with your chosen weapon leaves opponents unable to defend themselves if you strike them when their defenses are already compromised.

**Prerequisites**: [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]], [[Dazzling Display (Feat)|Dazzling Display]], base attack bonus +6, proficiency with weapon.

**Benefit**: Any [[Shaken|shaken]], [[Frightened|frightened]], or [[Panicked|panicked]] opponent hit by you this round is [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]] to your attacks until the end of your next turn. This includes any additional attacks you make this round.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 133
